pkgmetadata.longdescription: This simple extension provides bindings to the Linux unshare() syscall, added in kernel version 2.6.16By using unshare(), new and interesting features of the Linux kernel can be exploited, such as:* Creating a new network name space (CLONE_NEWNET)* Creating a new file system mount name space (CLONE_NEWNS)* Reverting other features shared from clone()
